Job Title: Supervisor, OOH Investment

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
About Evergreen

At Evergreen Trading, we’re driven by collaboration and value creation for our clients. That’s why we’re the go-to, strategic partner for marquee brands across industries. Headquartered in NYC, we’re a media investment and trade firm that helps brands achieve their goals by leveraging their unwanted assets to purchase media. Our unique approach allows clients to improve their ROI by turning excess inventory, equipment, real estate, and more into media purchasing power. If you're looking for a dynamic work environment and have a passion for doing things differently, Evergreen Trading is the place for you. Check out our brand video here.

Department Description

The Out of Home Investment team at Evergreen is a full-service OOH shop that handles everything from idea conception and client brief, to post-campaign analytics. The team consists of ten people split into two groups. The Supervisor will be a part of a team of 6 that handles various accounts, including Altice and 7-Eleven.

Position Description

The ideal candidate has experience planning and buying Outdoor campaigns across multiple markets in the US and can hit the ground running. We are looking for an upbeat, outgoing Supervisor with strong written and verbal skills. Our goal is to provide this person with continued growth opportunities by having them lead accounts, foster internal and external relationships, participate in client meetings, and negotiate trade deals.

Duties And Responsibilities

Media Buying and Planning:

Manage and lead key agency accounts being both the internal and external day-to-day contactSteward OOH media plans from inception through completion, and ensure deadlines are met


Managerial Responsibilities:

Supervise Associate and/or Buyer’s day-to-day workloadManage internal agency relationshipsParticipate in strategy development and brainstorming meetings


Administrative and Networking Responsibilities:

Oversee contracting and billing processes to ensure accuracyWrite department POVs and newslettersDevelop and maintain strong media vendor relationshipsBe an active participating member of relevant industry organizationsAttend industry and client related functions


Knowledge & Skills

Minimum 5 years of relevant work experienceExperience using Geopath toolsExperience in DoMedia is a plusIn-depth knowledge of Microsoft OfficeProficient understanding of media planning terms and concepts such as GRPs, ROI, Reach and Frequency, as well as OOH Ratings


Core Competencies

Strong attention to detail and ability to proofread documents for accuracyMust be highly organizedPossess strong written and verbal communication skillsAbility to integrate and work successfully with various agency teams, handle multiple projects, and meet tight deadlines under pressureKnowledge of various OOH tools and studies available and how to apply each


Salary: $80,000 - $100,000

The above represents the expected base salary range for this role. Exact compensation is determined by level of experience, location, and other job-related factors.

Why Work With Us

Since our founding in 2009, Evergreen Trading has always believed that our people are the most valuable part of our business. That’s why our company is 100% employee owned. It’s also why we continue to invest in our employees' professional and personal development through company-sponsored training, mentorship, and a dedication to DEIB. Other highlights include:

Automatic enrollment in the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (“ESOP”)401(k) plan with an employer matchExtensive benefits offering in which Evergreen covers 75% of health premiums for employee and dependent coverageGenerous time off including office closure between Christmas and New Year’s DayHybrid work schedule


Evergreen Trading is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment. We welcome candidates from all backgrounds to apply and believe diversity enhances our creativity, innovation, and overall success. All employment opportunities at the company are based upon an individual’s qualifications to perform the essential functions of a particular job and business needs, without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, caregiver status, veteran status, disability status, or any other legally protected characteristics.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
